M·∫´u c√≥ \(n=40\) s·ªë li·ªáu. Nh√≥m 1 c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã ƒë·∫°i di·ªán \(x_1=35\) v√† t·∫ßn s·ªë \(n_1=4\), v√¢n v√¢n cho ƒë·∫øn nh√≥m 6 c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã ƒë·∫°i di·ªán \(x_6=85\) v√† t·∫ßn s·ªë \(n_6=2\). Trung b√¨nh l√†

\[\begin{align*}
    \overline{x}
        & = \frac{1}{n}(n_1\cdot x_1 + n_2\cdot x_2 + n_3\cdot x_3 + n_4\cdot x_4 + n_5\cdot x_5 + n_6\cdot x_6) \\
        & = \frac{1}{40} (4\cdot 35 + 10\cdot 45 + 14\cdot 55 + 6\cdot 65 + 4\cdot 75 + 2\cdot 85) \\
        & = \frac{111}{2} \\
        & = 55,5 \text{ (cm).}
\end{align*}\]


Quan s√°t c·ªôt T·∫ßn s·ªë t√≠ch l≈©y, ta th·∫•y \[
cf_2=14 <\frac{n}{2}=\frac{40}{2}=20 <cf_3=28.
\] Suy ra nh√≥m 3, \([50;55)\), l√† nh√≥m ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n c√≥ t·∫ßn s·ªë t√≠ch l≈©y kh√¥ng nh·ªè h∆°n 20. Nh√≥m n√†y c√≥ ƒë·∫ßu m√∫t tr√°i \(r=50\), ƒë·ªô d√†i \(d=10\) v√† t·∫ßn s·ªë \(n_3=14\). Trung v·ªã l√†
\[\begin{align*}
      M_e
          & = r + \left(\frac{\frac{n}{2}-cf_2}{n_3}\right)\cdot d \\
          & = 50 + \left(\frac{20-14}{14}\right)\cdot 10 \\
          & = \frac{380}{7} \\
          & \approx 54,2857 \text{ (cm).}
  \end{align*}\]



Quan s√°t c·ªôt T·∫ßn s·ªë t√≠ch l≈©y, ta th·∫•y \[
cf_1=4 < \frac{n}{4}=\frac{40}{4}=10 < cf_2=14.
\] Suy ra nh√≥m 2, \([40;50)\), l√† nh√≥m ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n c√≥ t·∫ßn s·ªë t√≠ch l≈©y kh√¥ng nh·ªè h∆°n 10. Nh√≥m n√†y c√≥ ƒë·∫ßu m√∫t tr√°i \(s=40\), ƒë·ªô d√†i \(h=10\) v√† t·∫ßn s·ªë \(n_2=10\). T·ª© ph√¢n v·ªã th·ª© nh·∫•t l√†
\[\begin{align*}
      Q_1
          & = s + \left( \frac{\frac{n}{4}-cf_1}{n_2}\right)\cdot h \\
          & = 40 + \left(\frac{10-4}{10}\right)\cdot 10 \\
          & = 46 \text{ (cm).}
  \end{align*}\]
T·ª© ph√¢n v·ªã th·ª© hai \(Q_2\) ch√≠nh l√† trung v·ªã \(M_e\), hay \(Q_2 = M_e = 54,2857\) (cm).



Quan s√°t c·ªôt T·∫ßn s·ªë t√≠ch l≈©y, ta th·∫•y \[
cf_3=28<\frac{3n}{4}=\frac{3\cdot 40}{4}=30<cf_4=34.
\] Suy ra nh√≥m 4, \([60;70)\), l√† nh√≥m ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n c√≥ t·∫ßn s·ªë t√≠ch l≈©y kh√¥ng nh·ªè h∆°n 30. Nh√≥m n√†y c√≥ ƒë·∫ßu m√∫t tr√°i \(t=60\), ƒë·ªô d√†i \(l=10\) v√† t·∫ßn s·ªë \(n_4=6\). T·ª© ph√¢n v·ªã th·ª© ba l√†
\[\begin{align*}
      Q_3
          & = t + \left(\frac{\frac{3n}{4}-cf_3}{n_4}\right)\cdot l \\
          & = 60 + \left(\frac{30-28}{6}\right)\cdot 10 \\
          & = \frac{190}{3} \\
          & = 63,3333 \text{ (cm).}
  \end{align*}\]



Quan s√°t c·ªôt T·∫ßn s·ªë, nh√≥m 3, \([50;60)\), l√† nh√≥m c√≥ t·∫ßn s·ªë l·ªõn nh·∫•t \(n_3=14\). N√≥ c√≥ ƒë·∫ßu m√∫t tr√°i \(u=50\) v√† ƒë·ªô d√†i \(g=10\). Nh√≥m 2 c√≥ t·∫ßn s·ªë \(n_2=10\) v√† nh√≥m 4 c√≥ t·∫ßn s·ªë \(n_4=6\). M·ªët l√† \[\begin{align*}
     M_o
         & = u + \left(\frac{n_3-n_2}{2n_3-n_2-n_4}\right) \cdot g \\
         & = 50 + \left(\frac{14-10}{2\cdot 14-10-6}\right)\cdot 10 \\
         & = \frac{160}{3} \\
         & \approx 53,3333 \text{ (cm)}.
\end{align*}\]
